text: Up Tight (also known as Up-Tight Everything's Alright) is the fifth studio album by American singer-songwriter Stevie Wonder. It was released on May 4, 1966 by Tamla. The album reached No.33 on the Billboard Pop Album charts and No.2 on the R&B; Albums charts.[ Allmusic.com - Stevie Wonder album chart details] The album has the popular hit "Uptight (Everything's Alright)". == Track listing == #"Love a Go Go" (Beth Beatty, Ernie Shelby) - 2:46 #"Hold Me" (Morris Broadnax, Clarence Paul, Wonder) - 2:36 #"Blowin' in the Wind" (Bob Dylan) - 3:46 (additional vocals by Clarence Paul) #"Nothing's Too Good for My Baby" (Henry Cosby, Sylvia Moy, William Stevenson) - 2:39 #"Teach Me Tonight" (Sammy Cahn, Gene De Paul) - 2:39 (additional vocals by The Four Tops) #"Uptight (Everything's Alright)" (Wonder, Moy, Cosby) - 2:54 #"Ain't That Asking for Trouble" (Moy, Paul, Wonder) - 2:49 #"I Want My Baby Back" (Harvey Fuqua, Cornelius Grant, Eddie Kendricks, Norman Whitfield) - 2:49 #"Pretty Little Angel" (Paul, Mike Valvano, Wonder) - 2:12 #"Music Talk" (Ted Hull, Paul, Wonder) - 2:52 #"Contract on Love" (Janie Bradford, Lamont Dozier, Brian Holland) - 2:06 #"With a Child's Heart" (Vicky Basemore, Cosby, Moy) - 3:08 == References == Category:1966 albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Soul albums Category:Stevie Wonder albums
title: Up-Tight
